page.title: 04 Old Folks Homes
page.content:
Elmwood is an old folks home in { {Colyford}.It can accommodate 22 people. Each bedroom has a T.V. set, a chest of drawers, a bed, a few chairs and a bathroom. It also has a spacious living_room and a dining room. For invalids special lifts are provided, so they can go upstairs.
White Cliff is the largest Authorty Home in{Seaton}.The 63 residents range from 76 to 97 years of age. There are 31 staff to look after them. Most of them spend all their time sitting in chairs, reading or staring at the walls.
Most of the residents in the various homes come from out of the area, as far as Scotland and South Africa.
